 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹ֫מֶר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Lev.23.11|Lev 23:11]]</sup> ==sheaf== (***swath***, row of fallen grain, [[BDB#Wetzst|Wetzst]]<sup>Z. f. Ethnol. 1873, 273 (Syriac Dreschtafel)</sup>, against him [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>Landwirthschaft in Pal, 61</sup> who translates ***heap of sheaves***); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> absolute [[Deut.24.19|Deut 24:19]]; [[Lev.23.11|Lev 23:11]]; [[Lev.23.12|Lev 23:12]]; [[Lev.23.15|Lev 23:15]], construct v[[Lev.23.10|Lev 23:10]] figurative of food (absolute) [[Job.24.10|Job 24:10]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֳמָרִים‎</span> literal [[Ruth.2.7|Ruth 2:7]]; [[Ruth.2.15|Ruth 2:15]]. 

 II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹ֫מֶר‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Exod.16.22|Exod 16:22]]</sup> ==omer== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***small drinking cup*** or ***bowl***; relation to I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ע‎</span> obscure); — a measure, only [[Exod.16|Exod 16]] — the measure itself v[[Exod.16.18|Exod 16:18]] v[[Exod.16.32|Exod 16:32]] v[[Exod.16.33|Exod 16:33]] amount measured v[[Exod.16.16|Exod 16:16]] v[[Exod.16.22|Exod 16:22]] = 1/10 ephah v[[Exod.16.36|Exod 16:36]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] <span class="bdbLangGreek">γόμορ</span>.
